data.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%middlegame%' AND opening_tags LIKE '%Dutch_Defense%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%sacrifice%' AND themes LIKE '%fork%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE rating > 1900 OR themes LIKE '%master%'

data.text: Can you give me a quick puzzle
data.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE themes LIKE '%short%'

data.text: Give me a challenging puzzle that has a knight fork
data.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE rating > 1900 AND themes LIKE '%knightEndgame%' AND themes LIKE '%fork%'

data.text: I need a puzzle about the Queen's Gambit Declined in the beginning of the game
data.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%Queens_Gambit_Declined%' AND themes LIKE '%opening%'

data.text: I want to get better at attacking
data.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE (themes LIKE '%kingsideAttack%' OR themes LIKE '%queensideAttack%') AND themes NOT LIKE '%defensiveMove%'
SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%Italian%' OR opening_tags LIKE '%Ruy_Lopez%' OR opening_tags LIKE '%Scotch%'

data.text: I want to beat my friend who keeps playing the Italian
data.sql: SELECT * FROM t_puzzle WHERE opening_tags LIKE '%Italian%' AND themes LIKE '%crushing%' AND (themes LIKE '%opening%' OR themes LIKE '%middlegame%')
